trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of constraints for a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de restrições para uma <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection is accessed through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection can contain both <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> and <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> objects for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection pode conter os dois <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>objetos para <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> e</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>objeto torna-se de que os dados em uma coluna específica sempre são exclusivos para preservar a integridade dos dados.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> determines what will occur in related tables when data in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is either updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>determina o que ocorrerá em relacionados tabelas quando dados no <xref:System.Data.DataTable>é atualizado ou excluído.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a row is deleted, the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma linha for excluída, o <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>determinará se as linhas relacionadas também são excluídas (uma cascata) ou algum outro curso de ação.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you add a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> that creates a relationship between two tables to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, both a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> and a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> are created automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando você adiciona um <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>que cria uma relação entre duas tabelas para um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, ambos um <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>e um <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>são criadas automaticamente.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is applied to the primary key column in the parent <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and the constraint is added to that table's ConstraintCollection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>é aplicada à coluna de chave primária no pai <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, e a restrição é adicionada à ConstraintCollection da tabela.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's ConstraintCollection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>é aplicada a coluna de chave primária e a coluna de chave estrangeira, e a restrição é adicionada à ConstraintCollection da tabela filho.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection uses standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection usa métodos de coleção padrão como <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A>e <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método pode ser usado para procurar a existência de uma restrição específica na coleção.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is created when a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> property set to `true` is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>é criado quando um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>com seus <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>propriedade definida como `true` é adicionado a um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objeto <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is created when a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>é criado quando um <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>é adicionado a um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing constraints, the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se a coleção é alterada com êxito, adicionando ou removendo restrições, a <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Constraint" name="Constraint" href=""></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Constraint" name="Constraint" href=""></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The constraint argument is null.
trans-unit.target: O constraint argumento for nulo.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection, or belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: A restrição já pertence a esta coleção ou pertence a outra coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the same name.
trans-unit.target: A coleção já tem uma restrição com o mesmo nome.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (A comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>, and value that indicates whether the column is a primary key, and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref> com o nome especificado, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>e o valor que indica se a coluna é uma chave primária e o adiciona à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição é adicionada com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> à qual a restrição se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column should be the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a coluna deve ser a chave primária.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the column will be a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, a coluna será uma coluna de chave primária.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection.
trans-unit.target: A restrição já pertence a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: -Or- The constraint belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: - Ou - a restrição pertence a outra coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: A coleção já tem uma restrição com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (A comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, parent column, and child column, and adds the constraint to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref> com o nome especificado, pai coluna e a coluna filho e adiciona a restrição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição é adicionada com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The primary key, or parent, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave primária ou pai, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The foreign key, or child, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave estrangeira ou filho, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects, and value that indicates whether the column is a primary key, and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref> com o nome especificado, a matriz de <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objetos e o valor que indica se a coluna é uma chave primária e o adiciona à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição é adicionada com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objetos aos quais a restrição se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column should be the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a coluna deve ser a chave primária.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the column will be a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, a coluna será uma coluna de chave primária.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection.
trans-unit.target: A restrição já pertence a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: -Or- The constraint belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: - Ou - a restrição pertence a outra coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: A coleção já tem uma restrição com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (A comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>, with the specified arrays of parent columns and child columns, and adds the constraint to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>, com as matrizes especificadas de colunas pai e filho e adiciona a restrição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição é adicionada com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects that are the primary key, or parent, columns.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objetos que são as colunas de chave primária, ou pai.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects that are the foreign key, or child, columns.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objetos que são as colunas de chave estrangeira ou filho.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> matriz ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>tiver sido chamado, `AddRange` não adiciona todos os objetos na coleção até <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`.
trans-unit.target: No momento em que `EndInit` é chamado, a coleção será preenchida com os itens especificados na chamada mais recente para `AddRange`.

trans-unit.source: If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added.
trans-unit.target: Se `AddRange` for chamado várias vezes dentro de um `BeginInit` / `EndInit` de sequência, somente os itens especificados na chamada mais recente para `AddRange` são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> objetos para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> pode ser removido.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior whenever a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, is to add a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> to the parent table and a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> to the child table.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão sempre que um <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>é adicionado a um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, é adicionar um <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>à tabela pai e um <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>para a tabela filho.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is applied to the foreign key column of the child table.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>é aplicada à coluna de chave primária da tabela pai e o <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>é aplicada à coluna de chave estrangeira da tabela filho.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: Because trying to remove the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> before removing the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the CanRemove method before calling Remove, to make sure that the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Porque a tentativa de remover o <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>antes de remover o <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>faz com que uma exceção seja lançada, você deve sempre usar o método CanRemove antes de chamar remover, para certificar-se de que o <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>pode ser removido.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to be tested for removal from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> a ser testado para remoção da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> can be removed from collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> pode ser removido da coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de qualquer <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if this action is successful.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a ação foi bem-sucedida.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> is changed because of <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects being added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre sempre que o <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> é alterada por <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objetos que estão sendo adicionados ou removidos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object specified by name exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> especificado pelo nome do objeto existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether the specified <xref:System.Data.Constraint> exists before trying to remove it from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Contains para determinar se especificado <xref:System.Data.Constraint>existe antes de tentar removê-lo da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Constraint>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>método para determinar se um <xref:System.Data.Constraint>pode ser removido.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*> of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>da restrição.</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified constraint; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coleção contém a restrição especificada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os objetos da coleção para um unidimensional <xref:System.Array>instância iniciando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos valores copiados da coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz na qual iniciar a inserção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to return an index to be used with either the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> or <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Use o método IndexOf para retornar um índice a ser usado com qualquer um de <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> se ele estiver na coleção; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> specified by name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> especificado pelo nome.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to return an index to be used with either the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> or <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>método para retornar um índice a ser usado com qualquer um de <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> se ele estiver na coleção; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to test for the existence of a specific constraint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método para testar a existência de uma restrição específica.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the constraint to return.
trans-unit.target: O índice da restrição para retornar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index value is greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice é maior que o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da coleção com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to test for the existence of a specific constraint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método para testar a existência de uma restrição específica.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*> of the constraint to return.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>da restrição para retornar.</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> with the specified name; otherwise a null value if the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> com o nome especificado; caso contrário, um valor nulo se o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> não existe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar o `Remove` método, você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método para determinar se a coleção contém o destino <xref:System.Data.Constraint>e o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>método para determinar se um <xref:System.Data.Constraint>pode ser removido.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição for removida com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: The constraint argument is .
trans-unit.target: The constraint argument is .

trans-unit.source: The constraint does not belong to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A restrição não pertence à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object specified by name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> o objeto especificado pelo nome da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar o `Remove` método, você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método para determinar se a coleção contém o destino <xref:System.Data.Constraint>e o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>método para determinar se um <xref:System.Data.Constraint>pode ser removido.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição for removida com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of a specific <xref:System.Data.Constraint>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>método retorna o índice de um determinado <xref:System.Data.Constraint>.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before using the `RemoveAt` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar o `RemoveAt` método, você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>método para determinar se a coleção contém o destino <xref:System.Data.Constraint>e o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>método para determinar se um <xref:System.Data.Constraint>pode ser removido.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorrerá se a restrição for removida com êxito.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: The collection does not have a constraint at this index.
trans-unit.target: A coleção não tem uma restrição no índice.
